title: Tapa Cloth, 19th century
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Henry J. Bernheim
description: Irregularly-shaped, two thicknesses, printed in rust on white in squares containing four triangles, squares containing elongated petal shapes, and other curved and rectangular ornaments. Darker pigment may have been painted on.

tombstone.epitaph:
Tapa Cloth, 19th century.
19th century. Medium: bark
Technique: beaten. Gift of Mrs. Henry J. Bernheim. 1958-140-11.
